## vision\_v1.Schema$PurgeProductsRequest interface

Request message for the `PurgeProducts` method.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Schema$PurgeProductsRequest 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [deleteOrphanProducts](./vision.vision_v1.schema_purgeproductsrequest.deleteorphanproducts.md) | boolean \| null | If delete\_orphan\_products is true, all Products that are not in any ProductSet will be deleted. |
|  [force](./vision.vision_v1.schema_purgeproductsrequest.force.md) | boolean \| null | The default value is false. Override this value to true to actually perform the purge. |
|  [productSetPurgeConfig](./vision.vision_v1.schema_purgeproductsrequest.productsetpurgeconfig.md) | [Schema$ProductSetPurgeConfig](./vision.vision_v1.schema_productsetpurgeconfig.md) | Specify which ProductSet contains the Products to be deleted. |
